_meanings:
Alliteration, repetition of
similar letters, syllables or sounds;
{#varRasAmyamanuprAsaH#} <ls>K. P. 9</ls>; ( 
{#svaravEsAdfSye'pi vyaMjanasadfSatvaM varRasAmyaM rasAdyanugataH#}
{#prakfzwo nyAsaH; anuprAsaH SabdasAmyaM vEzamyepi#}
{#svarasya yat#} <ls>S. D. 633.</ls>) {#anuprAsa#} is
of {5} kinds; ({%a%}) {#Ceka°#} or single
alliteration; {#bakulagaMDAnaMDIkurvan#}, 
{#kAverIvAripAvanaH pavanaH; mUrDnAmudvfttakfttAviralagarala#} &c.
<ls>K. P. 7.</ls> ({%b%}) {#vftti°#} or harmonious. ({%c%})
{#Sruti°#} or melodious. ({%d%}) {#aMtya°#} or
final; as {#maMdaM hasaMtaH pulakaM vahaMtaH#}. ({%e%})
{#lAwa°#}; {#smerarAjIvanayane nayane kiM nimIlite#}.
For definitions and examples see
<ls>S. D. 633-38</ls> and <ls>K. P. 9</ls>th Ullāsa.
